__prompts__.protocol_name: Name of the protocol (e.g. UWS, TAP, Conesearch)
__prompts__.output_dir: Output directory for the protocol specification
__prompts__.protocol_full_title: Full title of the protocol (e.g. Universal Worker Service (UWS))
__prompts__.wg_name: Name of the IVOA Working Group responsible for the protocol
__prompts__.wg_email: Email address of the IVOA Working Group responsible for the protocol
